hero.title: Watch Ori-OS in action
hero.headline: See how Ori-OS replaces your Frankenstack in under 20 minutes
hero.subtitle: Get a guided tour of how agencies and lean B2B teams use Ori-OS to run outbound, CRM, automations, and client workspaces from one Revenue OS.

demoSections.title: From lead lists to live campaigns
points: Import or build a lead list and segment by ICP.
Connect mailboxes and configure deliverability-safe send limits.
Launch your first campaign from inside a client workspace.

demoSections.title: Workspaces, pipelines, and client views
points: How workspaces structure each client or product line.
How deals, tasks, and docs live alongside outbound activity.
How agencies use pipelines and dashboards in QBRs.

demoSections.title: Automations that run your revenue engine
points: Triggers based on new leads, replies, and stage changes.
Actions that create tasks, move deals, and send webhooks.
Templates for common flows like new client onboarding and re-engagement.

demoSections.title: GDPR-aware, deliverability-first outbound
points: How lawful-basis fields, suppression, and audit logs work in practice.
How Ori-OS helps you avoid sending surprises and keep domains healthy.

whoFor.title: Who this demo is for
audiences: B2B agencies running multiple outbound retainers.
RevOps consultants standardizing how clients run revenue.
Lean SaaS and tech teams that want a simpler stack than a full CRM suite.

nextSteps.title: Next steps after the demo
nextSteps.description: At the end of the session, we'll:
points: Map your current stack to Ori-OS.
Suggest a starting workspace and plan (Starter, Growth, or Agency Pro).
Share a recording so you can review internally.
nextSteps.note: If you're not ready to talk yet, you can explore the Features and Pricing pages and come back to book a demo when you're ready.
